game.name: Take Care Of Baby Elsa
game.description:
Little Elsa is at home alone as her parents have gone outside for some important work. Now you have taken the responsibility of taking care of her. So, it does not make a sense to wait anymore. Join Take Care Of Baby Elsa game and prove the world that you also have the skills to deal with all the problems the little baby faces off! Make sure to follow the instructions to complete each task Elsa assigns you. Be kind as she is a special Disney princess!
When you first enter the game, you will notice that the entire home has got freeze suddenly. Collect the wood and give them some fire to unfreeze her home! Give her an instant and then help her to choose a nice outfit in this brand new dressing game for girls! Make sure to cover her hands with the gloves before unfreezing the home. Use soap on her face and then clean her face with other items that you see at the bottom of the screen! Do not forget to remove all the water using the towel. 
Give her face a needful massage and then come to last step that is dressing her up! You can choose a t-shirt and cool jeans or dress her up with an elegant short frock. She will look awesome in short hairstyle and do not forget to combine her dress with a pair of excellent shoes and other accessories like cozy glass or a jewelry on her neck. Mix and match as many items as you can until you prepare the best look for her in one of the top girls games that are free to play online, no download required!
